i not sure, what happened, but, sometimes on TabItem.dispose() i get error:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.CTabFolder.onPaint(CTabFolder.java:1196)

Veronika, can you see any way this can happen?

The error indicates that somehow the selection index got screwed up and 
pointed at index 1 when there was only one item in the folder.  I am unable to 
reproduce the problem with a simple test case.

Filipp, is this error happening in your own plugin and if so could you include 
some code.  If not, can you give a set of steps in Eclipse to reproduce the 
problem.

I have not seen this error in 3.0.  Also, this area is being totally rewritten 
for 3.0.

Please re-open bug report if probelm occurs in 3.0.  Thank you.
